title: Virtual Environment-Based Professional English Communication Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: Practical English training course for entry-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, utilizing smartphone-based virtual environment platforms

learning_goals: Learners can use profession-related English expressions in VR-based simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete at least three practical projects with native speakers using virtual collaboration tools
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans based on language use data collected in digital portfolios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
